name: Moi Mei 2
description:
Feature of game:
  • Changing gravity
  • Complex puzzles
  • Mystical atmosphere
  • Magic reducing mushrooms
  • Atmospheric music
  • Progress
  • Original story

Moi Mei 2 is an independent story filled with events from an alternate universe. Immerse yourself in the dark world of Moi Ma with the main character Mei.
